content:
The character has trained extensively with hand-to-hand weaponry, becoming proficient in the use of virtually all hand-held close combat arms. The “Universal” group includes the Primitive, Chain, Shock and Power groups. When a character attempts to use a weapon he does not have the correct Weapon Training Talent for, he suffers a –20 penalty to any relevant Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill Test.

Talent Groups: Chain, Shock, Power, Primitive, Universal
extraSubCategories: Adeptus Astartes, may not be taken by characters with a Psy Rating
